mapper.select: SELECT id, name, configuration, last_result_uri, description, is_deployed, intermediate_result_uri, created_at, modified_at FROM segment
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO segment (name, configuration, last_result_uri, description, is_deployed, intermediate_result_uri, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{name},#{configuration},#{lastResultUri},#{description},#{isDeployed},#{intermediateResultUri},now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE segment SET name = #{name}, modified_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
